From dispersion to unity. Patient care and intranets - hand in hand

Before switching to Hadron 8020, Cheshire and Wirral Partnership NHS Foundation Trust were reliant on a dated intranet that required improvement and slowed staff down. Now, staff have access to the information they need at the touch of a button.

Speed and delivery in a fully featured intranet

Tata Steel recognised the need to move to SharePoint Online following a strategic Intranet review in 2013 when it considered the limitations of its legacy Intranet.

Hadron helps Queen Victoria Hospital

The Queen Victoria Hospital NHS Foundation Trust was a fragmented organisation without clear lines of communication. Now, they rely on the intranet for the efficient, clear sharing of information. And with the addition of Hadron Connect, it’s even helping them increase department visibility and connectivity...

One, unifying Business Intelligence solution for NEAS

Before Meson-BI, multiple siloed systems were making progress impossible for the North East Ambulance Service NHS Foundation Trust. Now, the Trust stands poised to cut costs and improve patient care.
